titleStmt.title: Die Iovis 28 Maii, 1646. For as much as many writs of error be now brought, and may hereafter be brought, and the records thereupon be removed into this present Parliament: ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Order to print signed: Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
An order of the Lords that writs of error be prosecuted within eight days.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
